languages.text: Мелкое насекомое пробегает по бледному лицу Инцендии и исчезает в приоткрытом рте. Воздух вокруг распятия пропитан тошнотворно-гнилостным дурманом.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] На пьедестале, где еще недавно стоял трон, стоит распятье с прибитым к нему телом Чорды

languages.text: A tiny insect runs across Incendia's pale face and disappears into her half-open mouth. The air around the crucifix is saturated with a nauseating, rotten stench.
languages.original_text: Мелкое насекомое пробегает по бледному лицу Инцендии и исчезает в приоткрытом рте. Воздух вокруг распятия пропитан тошнотворно-гнилостным дурманом.

traits.locale_text: A tiny insect runs across Incendia's pale face and disappears into her half-open mouth. The air around the crucifix is saturated with a nauseating, rotten stench.

A tiny insect runs across Incendia's pale face and disappears into her half-open mouth. The air around the crucifix is saturated with a nauseating, rotten stench.

languages.text: 小さな虫がインセンディアの蒼白い顔を横切り、口の中に消えていく。十字架の周囲は不快な腐臭で満ちている。
languages.original_text: A tiny insect runs across Incendia's pale face and disappears into her half-open mouth. The air around the crucifix is saturated with a nauseating, rotten stench.

traits.locale_text: 小さな虫がインセンディアの蒼白い顔を横切り、口の中に消えていく。十字架の周囲は不快な腐臭で満ちている。

languages.text: Un petit insecte trotte sur le visage blafard d'Incendia, avant de disparaître dans sa bouche à demi ouverte. Tout autour du crucifix, l'air est saturé d'une odeur nauséabonde de décomposition.
languages.original_text: A tiny insect runs across Incendia's pale face and disappears into her half-open mouth. The air around the crucifix is saturated with a nauseating, rotten stench.

traits.locale_text: Un petit insecte trotte sur le visage blafard d'Incendia, avant de disparaître dans sa bouche à demi ouverte. Tout autour du crucifix, l'air est saturé d'une odeur nauséabonde de décomposition.

languages.text: 一只小虫子划过因森蒂娅苍白的脸庞，消失在她半张着的嘴里。十字架周围的空气中弥漫着令人作呕的腐臭味。
languages.original_text: A tiny insect runs across Incendia's pale face and disappears into her half-open mouth. The air around the crucifix is saturated with a nauseating, rotten stench.

traits.locale_text: 一只小虫子划过因森蒂娅苍白的脸庞，消失在她半张着的嘴里。十字架周围的空气中弥漫着令人作呕的腐臭味。

languages.text: Ein winziges Insekt krabbelt über Incendias blasses Gesicht und verschwindet in ihrem halb geöffneten Mund. Die Luft um das Kruzifix ist erfüllt von einem brechreizerregenden, faulen Gestank.
languages.original_text: A tiny insect runs across Incendia's pale face and disappears into her half-open mouth. The air around the crucifix is saturated with a nauseating, rotten stench.

traits.locale_text: Ein winziges Insekt krabbelt über Incendias blasses Gesicht und verschwindet in ihrem halb geöffneten Mund. Die Luft um das Kruzifix ist erfüllt von einem brechreizerregenden, faulen Gestank.

languages.text: Un diminuto insecto recorre la pálida tez de Incendia y desaparece introduciéndose en su boca entreabierta. Alrededor del crucifijo, el aire está impregnado de un nauseabundo olor a descomposición.
languages.original_text: A tiny insect runs across Incendia's pale face and disappears into her half-open mouth. The air around the crucifix is saturated with a nauseating, rotten stench.

traits.locale_text: Un diminuto insecto recorre la pálida tez de Incendia y desaparece introduciéndose en su boca entreabierta. Alrededor del crucifijo, el aire está impregnado de un nauseabundo olor a descomposición.

languages.text: Minicik bir böcek, İncendia'nın soluk tenli çehresinde gezindikten sonra yarı açık ağzına girip gözden kayboluyor. Çarmıhın çevresini, insanın midesini kaldıran bir çürük kokusu işgal ediyor.
languages.original_text: A tiny insect runs across Incendia's pale face and disappears into her half-open mouth. The air around the crucifix is saturated with a nauseating, rotten stench.

traits.locale_text: Minicik bir böcek, İncendia'nın soluk tenli çehresinde gezindikten sonra yarı açık ağzının derinliklerinde gözden kayboluyor. Çarmıhın çevresini, insanın midesini kaldıran bir çürük kokusu işgal ediyor.
